text: Abdellatif Kechiche (; , born 7 December 1960) is a Tunisian-French actor, movie director and screenwriter. He is known for directing the movie Blue Is the Warmest Colour, which won the Palme d'Or at the 2013 Cannes Film Festival. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Tunisian movie actors Category:Tunisian screenwriters Category:French movie directors Category:French movie actors Category:French screenwriters Category:Writers from Tunis Category:Actors from Tunis
title: Abdellatif Kechiche
